column4: should I simply do the upgrade to 10.4 by clicking the update manager's button on 9.10?
if you want, make sure you back up any important data first (which you should routinely do anyway)
Tecna, littlepenguin thanks, ok I do my daily backup and upgrade, thanks (no encrypted partitions)... but I do have a separate /home and /opt with some special mounting, would that be a prob?
it shouldn't be the upgrade is reasonably careful not to stomp settings, I've never tried so ymmv (I generally rsync to my server and then do a nuke/install)
